TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract UCOMIConnectionPoint

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPoint` in the com subfolder of the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Advise (object pUnkSink, out int pdwCookie);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Advise(object pUnkSink, int32 pdwCookie) cil managed

Docs.param: Reference to the sink to receive calls for the outgoing interface managed by this connection point.
On successful return, contains the connection cookie.
Docs.summary: Establishes an advisory connection between the connection point and the caller's sink object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPoint::Advise` in the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void EnumConnections(class System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIEnumConnections ppEnum) cil managed

Docs.param: On successful return, contains the newly created enumerator.
Docs.summary: Creates an enumerator object for iteration through the connections that exist to this connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPoint::EnumConnections` in the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetConnectionInterface(valuetype System.Guid pIID) cil managed

Docs.param: On successful return, contains the IID of the outgoing interface managed by this connection point.
Docs.summary: Returns the IID of the outgoing interface managed by this connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPoint::GetConnectionInterface` in the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetConnectionPointContainer(class System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIConnectionPointContainer ppCPC) cil managed

Docs.param: On successful return, contains the connectable object's interface.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the interface pointer to the connectable object that conceptually owns this connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPoint::GetConnectionPointContainer` in the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Unadvise(int32 dwCookie) cil managed

Docs.param: The connection cookie previously returned from <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIConnectionPoint.Advise%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
Docs.summary: Terminates an advisory connection previously established through <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIConnectionPoint.Advise%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPoint::Unadvise` in the MSDN library.
